mapper.select: select a.id as tb_product_spu_id, a.number as tb_product_spu_number, a.spuName as tb_product_spu_name, b.id as tb_product_spu_img_id, b.path as tb_product_spu_img_path, b.sort as tb_product_spu_img_sort, b.statue as tb_product_spu_img_statue, c.id as tb_product_category_id, c.name as tb_product_category_name from tb_product_spu a right outer join tb_product_spu_img b on b.tb_product_spu_id = a.id left outer join tb_product_category c on c.id = a.tb_product_category_id order by tb_product_spu_img_sort asc ;

mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tb_product_spu
order by ${orderByClause}
